readme:
# Re:VIEW support for Atom [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/vvakame/language-review.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/vvakame/language-review)

[Re:VIEW](https://github.com/kmuto/review) is flexible document format/conversion system.
It is used primarily in Japan.

Re:VIEWAtom
review.js

## 

### 

Atom `language-review` `apm install language-review` 

Atomlanguage-review
Mac

```
$ curl -L https://github.com/vvakame/language-review/raw/master/install.sh | bash
```

### .re

`.re` grammarRe:VIEW

![grammar](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vvakame/language-review/master/docs/grammar-status.png)

### 

language-review `.re` 

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vvakame/language-review/master/docs/package-menu.png)

`Toggle Preview`  `.re` 
review.jsCSS


`Toggle Outline`  `.re` 


`Toggle Syntax List` review.js
[Re:VIEW](https://github.com/kmuto/review/blob/master/doc/format.ja.md)

### 

language-review[prh](https://github.com/vvakame/prh#proofread-helper-)
`.re` [](https://github.com/vvakame/prh/tree/master/misc) `prh.yml` 
`.re` 

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vvakame/language-review/master/docs/prh-warning.png)

## 

```
$ git clone git@github.com:vvakame/language-review.git
$ cd language-review
$ apm link --dev .
$ apm links
# OK
~/.atom/dev/packages (1)
 language-review -> ${pwd}
~/.atom/packages (0)
 (no links)
$ ./setup.sh
# 
$ atom --dev .
# 
```

grunt`npm install -g grunt-cli`

`grunt`

`grunt test`

PackageDebugON

![DebugON](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vvakame/language-review/master/docs/debug-option.png)

## 

MIT

Apache License Version 2.0[yanzmSublime Text2Re:VIEW](https://github.com/yanzm/ReVIEW)(review.tmLanguage)
Apache License Version 2.0[atom-lint](https://atom.io/packages/atom-lint)
